definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: They're less likely to nitpick about details that aren't relevant at this stage.
sentences.chinese: 减少他们在与主题不相关的细节上的吹毛求疵。

sentences.english: To really appreciate highlights, we need to zoom in a bit close.
sentences.chinese: 要鉴赏高光，我们需要放大这些细节。

sentences.english: The police report described, in horrifying detail, the nightmare that followed.
sentences.chinese: 警方卷宗描述了接下来发生的噩梦，令人战栗的细节。

sentences.english: Include the company details and your job title and responsibilities there.
sentences.chinese: 包括该公司的细节和您的职衔和责任。

sentences.english: Real-life details fill these books of the dead.
sentences.chinese: 真实的生活细节在这些死亡之书中随处可见。

sentences.english: See the sample for more information on how to do this.
sentences.chinese: 要了解更多具体如何做的细节，请参阅样本。

sentences.english: The future detailed prices were forecasted by univariate time series models.
sentences.chinese: 用单变量时间序列模型预测未来细节电价。

sentences.english: They are concerned with the training curriculum, but not the details of each course.
sentences.chinese: 他们参与培训课程，但是并不关心每一门课程的细节。

sentences.english: The two companies are discussing the details of the distributorship agreement.
sentences.chinese: 两家公司正在讨论代理权合约的细节。

sentences.english: But that price detail may turn a lot of heads.
sentences.chinese: 但是价格的细节可能会牵出很多头绪。

sentences.english: So that is my goal, to capture the fantastic details hidden in these natural wonders.
sentences.chinese: 捕捉匿藏在这些自然奇景中的奇异细节正是我的目标。

sentences.english: This is a repost for adding more details about the project.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个用于添加有关项目的更多细节转贴。

sentences.english: This was done to avoid cluttering the prototype with too much detail.
sentences.chinese: 这是为了避免说不清楚具有太多的细节的原型。

sentences.english: Read more details about the exams.
The Conductor's analytical mind helps her to ensure that no detail goes unconsidered.
sentences.chinese: 售票员的分析的头脑帮助她，以确保所有细节都几。

sentences.english: I will send more details to you once I see your references.
sentences.chinese: 我将派遣更多的细节，你一次我看见你的推荐。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
person/character (in a play, novel etc)/protagonist/CL:個|个[ge4]
